title: Bloomberg Markets: Russia Suspected in U.S. Power Plant Hacks
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Russia Suspected in U.S. Power Plant Hacks
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Hitesh Sheth President/CEO Vectra Networks Inc Discussing hackers working for a foreign government recently breached at least a dozen U.S. power plants, including the Wolf Creek nuclear facility in Kansas, according to current and former U.S. officials, sparking concerns the attackers were searching for vulnerabilities in the electrical grid. Winnie O'Kelley, Bloomberg News Executive Editor of Global Legal and Financial Regulation & Enforcement, also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
